hanzi-su-wiki:
屋

Значения

Дом, жильё; магазин, лавка; суффикс профессий

Мнемоника

  • Дом, достигнув 至 которого, можно сесть 尸 и отдохнуть.

  • "Людям необходимы почва 土 и жильё."

屋外(おくがい): outdoors
家屋(かおく): house, building

WaniKani_Radicals: 尸, 一, ム, 土
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Some of your private dirt is on the ground, so you stick a flag into it. Then on this private land you claimed, you build a roof. Under the roof you also build some shops and stores.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: That's the natural next progression of claiming some land. Building a roof upon it and building some shops and stores inside. You'll see why in a moment.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The roof covering the dirt is there so that the Yankees (や) can play baseball year round. The stores and shops are there to sell hot dogs and Yankees memorabilia.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You have yourself a whole Yankees stadium, and all it took was a roof and some shops / stores! If you build it, they will come.
Ru_Radicals: 厶 (значок МУ), 土 (земля), 尸 (труп), 至 (наиболее)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the corpse (尸) reaches (至) the roof
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A patriotic guy is not ready to leave his habitation (home) until he raises the flag everyday.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " corpse " to " to ", the original meaning is house and house. "Said Wen": "The home is from the corpse, the corpse, and the owner. One said: the corpse is like a house. From to, to, to and to end. Room and house are from to." "Poetry‧Qinfeng‧Small "Rong": "In its board house, my heart is disturbed."

" House " can mean covering. "Historical Records-Xiang Yu Benji": "Ji Xin rides the yellow house car." Zhang Shoujie Zhengyi quoted Li Fei as saying: "The emperor's car uses the yellow strip as the cover."

" House " can also mean veil, tent, and later written "幄". "Book of Rites-Miscellaneous Notes 1": "Sujin walks in the house." Zheng Xuan's note: "The house, in which the small tent is lined with the coffin."

" House " also refers to the zoning unit of ancient mine fields, with 300 acres as houses. "Zhou Li·Lang Guan·Xiao Situ": "Ping Jiao governance, right political affairs, Kauf House." Zheng Xuan's note: "The husband three is a house, and the house three is a well."
humanum_short_description_en: From " corpse ", from " to ", the original meaning is house, house.
humanum_full_description:
從「尸」，從「至」，本義為房舍、房屋。《說文》：「居也。从尸，尸，所主也。一曰：尸，象屋形。从至，至，所至止。室、屋皆从至。」《詩‧秦風‧小戎》：「在其板屋，亂我心曲。」

　　「屋」可表示覆蓋物。《史記‧項羽本紀》：「紀信乘黃屋車。」張守節正義引李斐曰：「天子車以黃繒為蓋裏。」

　　「屋」也可表示帷幄、帳幕，後寫作「幄」。《禮記‧雜記上》：「素錦以為屋而行。」鄭玄注：「屋，其中小帳，襯覆棺者。」

　　「屋」也指古代井田的區劃單位，三百畝為屋。《周禮‧地官‧小司徒》：「平教治，正政事，考夫屋。」鄭玄注：「夫三為屋，屋三為井。」
humanum_short_description: 從「尸」，從「至」，本義為房舍、房屋。

從「 尸 」，從「 至 」，本義為房舍、房屋。《說文》：「居也。从尸，尸，所主也。一曰：尸，象屋形。从至，至，所至止。室、屋皆从至。」《詩‧秦風‧小戎》：「在其板屋，亂我心曲。」 「 屋 」可表示覆蓋物。《史記‧項羽本紀》：「紀信乘黃屋車。」張守節正義引李斐曰：「天子車以黃繒為蓋裏。」 「 屋 」也可表示帷幄、帳幕，後寫作「 幄 」。《禮記‧雜記上》：「素錦以為屋而行。」鄭玄注：「屋，其中小帳，襯覆棺者。」 「 屋 」也指古代井田的區劃單位，三百畝為屋。《周禮‧地官‧小司徒》：「平教治，正政事，考夫屋。」鄭玄注：「夫三為屋，屋三為井。」
From " corpse" to " to", the original meaning is house and house. "Said Wen": "The home is from the corpse, the corpse, and the owner. One said: the corpse is like a house. From to, to, to and to end. Room and house are from to." "Poetry‧Qinfeng‧Small "Rong": "In its board house, my heart is disturbed." " House" can mean covering. "Historical Records-Xiang Yu Benji": "Ji Xin rides the yellow house car." Zhang Shoujie Zhengyi quoted Li Fei as saying: "The emperor's car uses the yellow strip as the cover." " House" can also mean veil, tent, and later written " 幄". "Book of Rites-Miscellaneous Notes 1": "Sujin walks in the house." Zheng Xuan's note: "The house, in which the small tent is lined with the coffin." " House" also refers to the zoning unit of ancient mine fields, with 300 acres as houses. "Zhou Li·Lang Guan·Xiao Situ": "Ping Jiao governance, right political affairs, Kauf House." Zheng Xuan's note: "The husband three is a house, and the house three is a well."

屋字的起名意思

屋的本义是幄，后来“屋”指房屋，另造“幄”字。本义：帐幕。

house
Basic explanation of words
house
wū
Room, room: house. House. houses.
Home: "Wuzhong visits Mo Si's house, Jiangnan painting is like a boat in a house."
Car cover, cover: yellow house (the car cover with yellow tape as the inside on the car used by the ancient emperors, also refers to the emperor car). Housing Society (a name for the overthrow of the dynasty).
The zoning of ancient minefields consisted of three hundred acres in one house.

Source glyph
house
Name meaning
The original meaning of "house" is 幄, and later "house" refers to the house, and the word "幄" was created. Original meaning: tabernacle.
wū
1) комната, помещение; дом, здание; жилище
他住西屋儿 он живёт в западной комнате (в западном крыле дома)
2) крыша (дома); верх (экипажа); покров, балдахин; покрышка
大室屋坏 на главном здании прохудилась крыша
-----
1) У (фамилия)
2) * дом, семья
3) у (единица обложения, равная трём земельным наделам в колодезной системе, равнялась 3000 步)

屋

Значения

Дом, жильё; магазин, лавка; суффикс профессий

Мнемоника

  • Дом, достигнув 至 которого, можно сесть 尸 и отдохнуть.

  • "Людям необходимы почва 土 и жильё."
Radicals: 尸, 一, ム, 土  (flag, ground, private, dirt)
Meaning Mnemonic
Some of your private dirt is on the ground, so you stick a flag into it. Then on this private land you claimed, you build a roof. Under the roof you also build some shops and stores.
That's the natural next progression of claiming some land. Building a roof upon it and building some shops and stores inside. You'll see why in a moment.
Reading Mnemonic
The roof covering the dirt is there so that the Yankees (や) can play baseball year round. The stores and shops are there to sell hot dogs and Yankees memorabilia.
You have yourself a whole Yankees stadium, and all it took was a roof and some shops / stores! If you build it, they will come.
